key.name: copy-action
key.summary: Whether and where to show the copy screenshot action. 0 will disable this action, positive numbers indicate the order they are shown in (lower numbers appear first).

key.name: file-action
key.summary: Whether and where to show the screenshot-to-file action. 0 will disable this action, positive numbers indicate the order they are shown in (lower numbers appear first).

key.name: tool-action
key.summary: Whether and where to show the screenshot tool action. 0 will disable this action, positive numbers indicate the order they are shown in (lower numbers appear first).

key.name: menu-position
key.summary: Position to show actions in the context menu. This is the number of items (including separators) which will appear before screenshot actions.

key.name: use-separators
key.summary: Use separators in the context menu around screenshot actions.

key.name: icon-in-menu
key.summary: Show icon next to menu items.
